attributes.action: call a referendum for a vote of confidence in all members of parliament following revelations about abhorent use of public money for expense claims
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: call a referundum for a vote of confidence in all members of parliament following revelations about abhorent use of public money for expense claims. If the vote of no confidence is passed a general election must be called immediately.

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
